text: wlyn sa'alt -ayha alrswl- hwla' almushrikin ballh: man khalq alsmwat walard? lyqwlunn allh, fa'iidha qaluu dhlk faqul lhm: alhamd lilah aladhi 'azhar alastdlal ealaykum min anfskm, bal 'akthar hwla' almushrikin la yunzarun wala yatadabarun man aladhi lah alhamd walshkr, fldhlk 'ashrakuu maeah ghyrh
